titleStmt.title: A speech to the King. Made by a minister of the French church of the Savoy, the 19th. of October, 1681. in the French tongue. And published at London by His Majesty's special command. Rendred into English
Harangue au Roy. English.
titleStmt.author: Lombard, André.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Joseph Ray at Colledge-Green, for William Mendey in the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A minister of the French church of the Savoy = André Lombard.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
